hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select {Feature.*} from Feature {Feature} inner join DataObject on {Feature}.DataObject_Id = DataObject.DataObject_Id inner join AccountFeedItem on AccountFeedItem.AccountFeedItem_Id = {Feature}.DataRow_Id inner join AccountFeed on AccountFeed.AccountFeed_Id = AccountFeedItem.AccountFeed_Id where DataObject.Name = 'AccountFeedItem' and AccountFeed.AccountFeed_Id = :AccountFeed_Id order by {Feature}.Created desc
